src/object/queue.cc

00001 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*
00002  * Operating Systems I                                                       *
00003  *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*
00004  *                                                                           *
00005  *                              Q U E U E                                    *
00006  *                                                                           *
00007  *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00008 
00009 #include "object/queue.h"
00010 
00011 void Queue::enqueue (Chain* item) { 
00012   item->next = 0;         // new item has no following item
00013   *tail = item;           // insert the element at the end of the list
00014   tail = &(item->next);   // and set new tail-pointer
00015 }
00016 
00017 Chain* Queue::dequeue () {
00018   Chain* item;
00019 
00020   item = head;            // head points to the first item of the list
00021   if (item) {             // head ist NULL if list is empty
00022     head = item->next;    // Das erste Element aus der Liste ausklinken.
00023     if (!head)            // if list is now empty tail has to point to head
00024       tail = &head;
00025     else                  // otherwise delete entry for following item
00026         item->next = 0;
00027   }
00028   return item;
00029 }
00030 
00031 void Queue::remove (Chain* item) {
00032   Chain* cur;
00033 
00034   if (head) {
00035     cur = head;            // start search at the head of the linked list
00036     if (item == cur)       // if first element is what we are looking for
00037       dequeue ();          // dequeue is enough
00038     else {
00039       // go through linked list one item at a time until end of list is reachted
00040       // or next item is the item we look for
00041       while (cur->next && item != cur->next) {
00042         cur = cur->next;
00043       }
00044 
00045       if (cur->next) {
00046         cur->next = item->next;   // delete item from list
00047         item->next = 0;           // delete entry for following item
00048 
00049         if (!cur->next)           // if cur has no following item tail has to be
00050           tail = &(cur->next);    // updated.
00051       }
00052     }
00053   }
00054 }
